languages.text: "Понимаю. Этот суд был беспрецедентным, как и его финал".
"Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю. Этот суд был беспрецедентным, как и его финал".

traits.locale_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."
"Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."
"Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."
"Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."
"Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."
"Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

languages.text: 「無理もありません。あの裁判は前例のないものでしたし、その結末も同様でした」
languages.original_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

traits.locale_text: 「無理もありません。あの裁判は前例のないものでしたし、その結末も同様でした」

languages.text: "Verständlich. Der Prozess war ohne Präzedenz, genau wie sein Ende."
languages.original_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

traits.locale_text: "Verständlich. Der Prozess war ohne Präzedenz, genau wie sein Ende."

languages.text: « Je comprends. On peut dire que ce procès était hors norme, à l'instar de son dénouement. »
languages.original_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. On peut dire que ce procès était hors norme, à l'instar de son dénouement. »

languages.text: «Es comprensible. Fue un juicio sin precedentes, igual que su conclusión».
languages.original_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

traits.locale_text: «Es comprensible. Fue un juicio sin precedentes, igual que su conclusión».

languages.text: “这一点可以理解。那场审判史无前例，结局也同样如此。”
languages.original_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

traits.locale_text: “这一点可以理解。那场审判史无前例，结局也同样如此。”

languages.text: "Makul. Eşsiz bir duruşmaydı. Sonu da keza."
languages.original_text: "Understandable. That trial was unprecedented, as was its ending."

traits.locale_text: "Makul. Eşsiz bir duruşmaydı. Sonu da keza."
